booking.step1.petFields.title: Pet {{number}}
booking.step1.petFields.name: Name
booking.step1.petFields.personalityPlace: Please tell us about your pet's personality and habits in detail so we can help them adapt to the new environment smoothly.
booking.step1.error: Please complete all pet fields before continuing.
booking.step1.maxPetsMessage: For more than 2 pets, please call: {{phoneNumber}}
booking.step2.calendar.title: Select dates
booking.step2.services.title: Services and schedules
booking.step2.importantNotes.title: Important notes:
booking.step2.importantNotes.bowls: Don't bring food/water bowls, we provide stainless steel dishes.
booking.step2.importantNotes.firstVisit: For first visits, we suggest arriving before noon. This will allow your pet to get used to the new environment before bedtime and will allow us to observe their reactions to the environment.
booking.step2.importantNotes.heat: Female dogs in heat are not allowed.
booking.step2.importantNotes.vets: We work with 2 veterinary clinics for emergencies.
booking.step2.importantNotes.holidays: Book in advance for holidays and vacation periods.
booking.step2.alerts.saturdayCheckIn: On Saturdays, pet drop-off must be before 2:00 PM.
booking.step2.alerts.saturdayCheckOut: On Saturdays, pet pick-up must be before 2:00 PM.
booking.step2.alerts.outOfHours: Hotel hours: 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Check-in/out outside these hours: €70 additional fee.
booking.summary.title: Booking Summary
booking.summary.transport.title: Transport Service
booking.summary.transport.priceNote: Final price will depend on location and will be agreed directly with the driver
booking.step3.alerts.groomingUnavailable: Sorry, the grooming service is not available for the last day of your booking (December 8th). If you would like this service, please select different dates or contact us for more information.
booking.step3.generalServices.title: General Services
booking.step3.petServices.title: Services for {{petName}}
booking.errors.petFields: Please complete all pet fields before continuing.
booking.errors.dateSelection: Please select check-in and check-out dates.
booking.errors.specialCare: Please write instructions for special care before continuing.
booking.errors.contactInfo: Please review your contact information. There are invalid or incomplete fields.
booking.errors.incompleteForm: Please review all fields. There is incomplete or invalid information.
booking.errors.saveReservation: There was an error saving the reservation. Please try again.
booking.confirmation.title: Request Registered
booking.confirmation.thanks: Thank you {{name}} for choosing our service!
booking.confirmation.email: We will send you an email with the booking confirmation.
booking.confirmation.pending: Remember that this is just a request, and the booking is not confirmed yet.
